transcript: I mean is there somebody you can call or the guys that put the stuff on the on the on the plane? I mean are they they're they must be really irresponsible to have just disappeared my baggage. I mean did it again so?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, is there somebody you can call?  Or the guy that put the stuff on the--on the plane.  I mean, are they--they must be really irresponsible to have just disappeared my baggage.  I mean, did it get stolen?
